main event: A UFO was observed on ground radar moving from NW to SE over Reynoldsville, Pennsylvania on August 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was tracked by ground radar at an altitude of 3,500 feet and at a speed of 1,100 mph., The sighting lasted for a total of 5 minutes., The radar operator could not positively identify the object., This case remains under evaluation by authorities., Witnesses included Mr. and Mrs. Amos Fisher who saw a bright light on August 31, 1962.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Amos Fisher driving on State Route 28
